mdRecord.dcterms:title: Samuel Vest Cemetery, In Little River District
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Located at the end of Vest Tannery Road about 1/3 mile past the "end of state maintenance" sign. The road past the sign is excellent because it is a common driveway for an upscale neighborhood. The cemetery sits about 100 yards off the road on the left just beyond 354 Vest Tannery Road.
N 37 00.256 W 080 13.265
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
